author: norman
msg: fixes dangerous-attributes removal regex (HUPA-52). Thx to Manuel for submitting this patch

author: buscob
msg: Dropping crumbs theme is now rendered well on Portal pages also.

Portal pages do not set headerItem variable to a ManuItem name value. This does not allow dropping crumbs theme to show the portal page name on the last part of the menu bar like all other pages. A solution still to be found.

author: mattmann
msg: - OK I think I get how to do this with the new M2 release plugin. Last time I'll be deleting this (hopefully) :)
